short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Manager for all your GBATemp needs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GBATemp Manager, Clean up GBATemp one step at a time

New in v0.2
You can now Hide Specific Threads with the simple "Hide Thread" Button placed next to each thread in the Sub-forum

You can optionally enable desktop notifications for the GBAtemp Conversations and Alerts however currently its just a silent popup in the bottom right corner We may change this in the future

Bug Fixes
- Recent Content bar no longer gets deleted if a thread with blocked keywords is shown in it
